text: Bernard "Bernie" Marcus (May 12, 1929 - November 4, 2024) was an American businessman. He co-founded Home Depot and was the company's first CEO. He served as Chairman of the Board until retiring in 2002. Marcus died on November 4, 2024 in Boca Raton, Florida at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American billionaires Category:American chief executives Category:American Jews Category:American philanthropists Category:Businesspeople from Atlanta Category:Businesspeople from Newark, New Jersey Category:Jewish billionaires Category:Jewish businesspeople Category:Jewish philanthropists Category:Republicans (United States)
